mapper.select: select id, file_name, file_size, file_url, file_type, owner_id, upload_time, download_cnt from upload_file order by upload_time limit #{offset},#{limit};
mapper.insert: insert into upload_file (file_name, file_size, file_url, file_type, owner_id, upload_time, download_cnt) values (#{fileName},#{fileSize},#{fileUrl},#{fileType},#{ownerId},#{uploadTime},#{downloadCnt});
